Traveling  in a company searching for a target is not efficient -- only one can increase his rating. It is better to be a Hunter. That means freedom of action and a high rating if you do everything right.

INFO_TARG_INVADERS.NAME: The Invaders' goal
INFO_TARG_INVADERS.TEXT: Our goal is War. This is how you gain your rating. The resources for war we extort from the Trances. In other sectors there are too many strong clans, so it's better to stay out of there.

INFO_TARG_NARGOON.NAME: The Nargoons' goal
INFO_TARG_NARGOON.TEXT: Our goal is guarding the specials. Presently, however, they do not need it. The specials are very powerful, especially some of their clans. It is time for us to look for a new goal.

INFO_TARG_PANZERS.NAME: The Panzers' goal
INFO_TARG_PANZERS.TEXT: We increase the rating by means of trading, as the Trances do. But unlike them, we will not give away our resources easily. We strive to become the best traders of the Range.

INFO_TARG_RECKONERS.NAME: The Reckoners' goal
INFO_TARG_RECKONERS.TEXT: Our goal is to find information.

INFO_TARG_RESTRICTORS.NAME: The Restrictors' goal
INFO_TARG_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: We strive to reach the highest rating; this is the main goal of the Restrictors. Our clan is not the largest, but it is one of the strongest. We will not let anyone else excel over our clan members.

INFO_TARG_SC.NAME: The Structure of Changes
INFO_TARG_SC.TEXT: There are many ways to develop, but the clans usually offer only one solution. In the Structure of Changes, you can act as you wish. As a member of the Structure of Changes, a mechmind receives power every time his rating is changed. The power is taken from the storage collected by all the members of the organization. With every visit to  the base, a small amount of power is extracted. The amount is not essential for a single mechmind, but the support after an increase of rating is quite large.

INFO_TARG_SINIGR.NAME: The Sinigers' goal
INFO_TARG_SINIGR.TEXT: When it was necessary, the Creators could go about without the support systems. They could increase their population without factories, in a natural way. We want to achieve everything that the Creators did.

INFO_TARG_TRANSES.NAME: The Trances' goal
INFO_TARG_TRANSES.TEXT: Our goal is similar to the majority -- the high rating. But avoid fighting, because it takes a lot of power and resources. We prefer to drive cargo. Slow but reliable! We operate only in those areas where there are no aggressive clans. That is mostly the Tundra and Rock Sectors. There is no sense in going farther if we do not want to fight.

INFO_TARG_TROOPS.NAME: The Packs' goal
INFO_TARG_TROOPS.TEXT: The Packs have no goals besides the profit and destruction of everything around.

INFO_TARG_WATCHSTONES.NAME: The Watchstones' goal
INFO_TARG_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: Why waste power to find an enemy? It is better to wait until the enemy comes to you, and then destroy him with an accurate shot. This is our goal -- to excel in fighting from an ambush.

INFO_TARG_WILD.NAME: The Wild's goal
INFO_TARG_WILD.TEXT: There is only one rule -- the  strongest gets all the resources. Our goal is to become the strongest, but we will have to destroy everything to achieve our goal.

INFO_T_L1_B2_3.NAME: One of the units delivered
INFO_T_L1_B2_3.TEXT: Visit the other Charge platform and deliver the repair module there.

INFO_T_L2_B1_3.NAME: Infopack delivered
INFO_T_L2_B1_3.TEXT: It is necessary to visit other Charge platforms.

INFO_WAYS.NAME: The Way
INFO_WAYS.TEXT:
As of today the world has two main Ways for the mechminds, the Way of specials and the way of Universals. The specials are low in numbers, since the main, basic directive of the Creators is for the mechminds to develop universally.

The specialization itself has not been around for long. This means that the world has changed a lot. What these changes may lead to is now a secret for everyone, including Super.

You will meet the supporters of the Universal Way everywhere. The specials are harder to find. They normally base at test complexes. Which Way you take is up to you.

INT_ABSORB_INFO.NAME: Absorption
INT_ABSORB_INFO.TEXT: Characterizes the number of hit-points absorbed by the energy field.

INT_BASE_AMMO.NAME: Ammo
INT_BASE_AMMO.TEXT: List of ammo available for sale at the base.

INT_BASE_BUY.NAME: Purchase
INT_BASE_BUY.TEXT: List of the goods needed here.

INT_BASE_EQUIPMENT.NAME: Equipment
INT_BASE_EQUIPMENT.TEXT: Full list of equipment available for sale at the base. This includes reactors, engines, protection systems, and a wide range of additional equipment.

INT_BASE_GLIDERS.NAME: Gliders
INT_BASE_GLIDERS.TEXT: List of glider bodies sold at the base.

INT_BASE_GUN.NAME: Weapons
INT_BASE_GUN.TEXT: List of weapons available for sale at the base.

INT_BASE_SOLD.NAME: Sale
INT_BASE_SOLD.TEXT: List of the goods for sale.

INT_DAMAGE_INFO.NAME: Damage
INT_DAMAGE_INFO.TEXT: Number of hit-points inflicted by the weapon. Some of the hit points can be absorbed by the field, while the rest will fall upon the armor and glider.

INT_EMPTY_ARMOR.NAME: [Armor not installed]
INT_EMPTY_ARMOR.TEXT: The armor protects the surface of the glider from damage. Until the armor has been fully eliminated, the glider remains intact.

INT_EMPTY_HEAVY_GUN.NAME: [Empty slot for heavy weapon]
INT_EMPTY_HEAVY_GUN.TEXT: Empty slot for heavy weapon. Any type of light weapon can be placed there.

INT_EMPTY_LIGHT_GUN.NAME: [Empty slot]
INT_EMPTY_LIGHT_GUN.TEXT: Empty slot for light weapons. Any type of light weapon can be placed there.

INT_EMPTY_SHIELD.NAME: [No Energy Field]
INT_EMPTY_SHIELD.TEXT: The energy-shield generator creates a field around the glider that contains part of the damage inflicted. The advantage of the energy shield is that it is charged from the reactor and does not require repairs.

INT_GOOD_WAS_BUIED.TEXT: The goods were bought for %d crystals.

INT_GT_TYPE_A_INFO.NAME: Attack gliders
INT_GT_TYPE_A_INFO.TEXT: Attack gliders are especially effective in close combat. They have high maneuverability and enhanced  defense, but are on the slow side.

INT_GT_TYPE_B_INFO.NAME: Basic gliders
INT_GT_TYPE_B_INFO.TEXT: The basic gliders are average in every sense of the word. They have decent maneuverability, good speed, and sizeable cargo capacity.

INT_GT_TYPE_S_INFO.NAME: High-speed gliders
INT_GT_TYPE_S_INFO.TEXT: This type of glider allows you to gain high speeds, but is less effective in close combat, since its maneuverability is fairly low.

INT_GT_TYPE__INFO.NAME: Cargo gliders
INT_GT_TYPE__INFO.TEXT: Cargo gliders have low  maneuverability, which considerably affects their combat characteristics.  However, they reach high speeds, have strong armor and large holds.

INT_GT_TYPE__INFO.NAME: Cargo gliders
INT_GT_TYPE__INFO.TEXT: Cargo gliders have low maneuverability, which considerably affects their combat characteristics. However they develop high speeds, have strong armor and large holds.

INT_GUN_TYPE1_INFO.NAME: Energy impact
INT_GUN_TYPE1_INFO.TEXT: The weapon using this type of impact inflicts damage by transmitting energy into the target. This type of weapon consumes a lot of energy and may overheat.

INT_GUN_TYPE2_INFO.NAME: Molecular impact
INT_GUN_TYPE2_INFO.TEXT: When shooting from a weapon that  uses the molecular type of impact, a charge is thrown into the target that may go through the energy field. The disadvantage of this weapon is limited ammo allowance. However, some of these weapon types may slowly refill the ammo allowance with the help of zero-generators.

INT_NETTO_INFO.NAME: Cargo capacity
INT_NETTO_INFO.TEXT: Overall weight of equipment, weaponry, and cargo that the glider can carry. When the maximum allowed weight is exceeded (the indicator will first turn yellow and then red), the glider speed will be considerably reduced.

INT_NOMONEY_FOR_INFO.TEXT: <color=red>You have nothing to pay for the information with.

INT_ORG_JOIN_NA.TEXT: <color=red>You cannot join this organization. You are of a different generation, %NAME.

INT_ORG_LIST.NAME: Organizations list
INT_ORG_LIST.TEXT: This section contains a list of organizations represented at this base. You can learn about those organizations, find out their attitude towards you, and probably join them or quit.

INT_ORG_LIST_ENTER.NAME: Join list
INT_ORG_LIST_ENTER.TEXT: This section contains a list of organizations you can join.

INT_ORG_RATING.NAME: Rating  of organization in this sector

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_DAMAGED.NAME: Repair Equipment
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_DAMAGED.TEXT: Damaged %d%% of equipment. <link:Repair all for %d crystals.=LINKREPAIRALL>

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_EQUIPMENT.NAME: Equipment
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_EQUIPMENT.TEXT: Additional equipment that makes a mechminds life more comfortable and extends the standard functions of a glider.

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_GLIDER.NAME: Glider
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_GLIDER.TEXT:
A glider base consists of the body, engine, reactor, and antigravity system. Destruction of any part of these systems leads to destruction of the glider.

There are five kinds of gliders, characterized by size and types: basic, attack, high-speed, cargo, and special. Each type is best suited for specific tasks, which are obvious from the gliders' specifications.

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_GUN.NAME: Weapons
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_GUN.TEXT:
A glider can carry light and heavy weaponry. Light gliders cannot be equipped with rockets and heavy weaponry due to weight limitations, but other weapons are still available.

By-default firing is controlled with left mouse button. The glider fires in the direction marked by the cursor. The weapons and ammo status is displayed in left middle part of the screen.

You can fire heavy weapons with right mouse button. Usually there is a certain delay between shots. The readiness to fire a heavy weapon is displayed in the left middle part of the screen.

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_INFO.NAME: General Information
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_INFO.TEXT:
Overall weight = %d kg.

Glider load= %d/%d%s kg.

Maximum acceleration: %d%s m/s.

Maximum speed: %d%s km/h.

Time to U-turn: %5.2f%s sec.

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_INFO2.NAME: Energy system
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_INFO2.TEXT:
Battery charge: %d/%d units.

Energy generating: %d%s units/sec.

Equipment consumption: %d units/sec.

Engine consumption/thrust: %d/%d%s units/sec.

INT_PMENU_GLIDER_SHIELD.NAME: Protection
INT_PMENU_GLIDER_SHIELD.TEXT:
The systems protecting the glider from aggressive forces. The more powerful the protection, the more chances you have to survive a battle. But good protection requires more power. There are two basic protection systems, the energy shield and armor. The rest are additional protection systems or extensions to the basic systems.

The status of the protection systems is displayed in the top left corner of the screen. The band with the shield logo displays the state of the armor. The band with the sphere logo displays the state of the energy field. If both of the values are close to zero, additional warnings are displayed in the middle of the screen.

INT_REAMMO_ALL.NAME: Refill ammo
INT_REAMMO_ALL.TEXT: <link:Refill ammo of all molecular weapons for %d crystals.=LINKREAMMOALL>

INT_SAFETY_ZONE_VIOLATE.TEXT: Weapon usage prohibited. Leave the area immediately or you will be destroyed.

INT_SELL_GOODS_FAIL.TEXT: Was buyed for: <color:4AC64A>%d<color> crystals. It is not needed here.

INT_SELL_NOMONEY_FORMAT.TEXT: Buy for:<color:0xFF2020>%d<color> crystals. You have not enough crystals.

INT_SELL_NO_FORMAT.TEXT: Buy for: <color:0xFF2020>%d<color> crystals. Out of stock.

INT_STANDARD_INFO.NAME: Standard
INT_STANDARD_INFO.TEXT:
There are a total of five glider, weapons, and equipment standards.

The higher the glider standard, the larger and more functional it is, but also the more expensive compared to previous standards.

The weapons mounted on the glider cannot be of a higher standard than the glider itself.

Basic equipment, such as reactor, engine, armor, and energy shield can only be of the same standard as the glider.

INT_THEMES.NAME: Topics
INT_THEMES.TEXT: Current information is divided into topics.

INT_TUNNEL_ACCESS.NAME: Access granted
INT_TUNNEL_ACCESS.TEXT: You need 100 power units to transfer. Since the process is unstable, you may need more power. 1,000 power units are enough in any case.  <link:Make the transfer!=LINKJUMP>

INT_TUNNEL_ACCESS_DENIDED.NAME: Access denied
INT_TUNNEL_ACCESS_DENIDED.TEXT: <color:red>You have not met all the transfer conditions.

INT_TUNNEL_THIS_SECTOR.NAME: You are in this sector
INT_TUNNEL_THIS_SECTOR.TEXT: You are now in this sector. You can get to other sectors through the tunnel. Wherever you go, you can always return to any sector you have already visited.

INT_VOLDAMAGE_INFO.NAME: Volumetric damage
INT_VOLDAMAGE_INFO.TEXT: Damage inflicted by blast wave. Due to its volumetric effect, this type of damage affects the energy field first, and then the armor and the glider.

ISTAR-214_TALK.TEXT: I always try the new tactics. It has helped me against the Carriers, but it looks like it does not work against you.

L1_INFO.NAME: Rock Sector
L1_INFO.TEXT: A deserted rocky area with dry sandy soil and infrequent oases. The area is surrounded with high mountains, and winds occur very seldom here. Rains are also very rare in this deserted area, and desert vegetation prevails. There are lakes supported by underground springs. Veinstone reaches the surface in some places, causing radioactive anomalies.

L2_INFO.NAME: Tundra Sector
L2_INFO.TEXT:
This area is geographically located in a valley to the South from the arctic areas, and has a milder climate. Sometimes it snows here, but the climate actuator maintains a stable air temperature within narrow limits, so it never snows inside the neutralizing field.

Despite the numerous lakes and rivers, the air is rather dry and clear. The terrain is rather even with some shallow ravines and hills.

L3_INFO.NAME: Arctic Sector
L3_INFO.TEXT: Located at the southernmost part of the continent. The temperature conditions of this area are the lowest possible for autonomous human colonies to survive. The elevation surrounding the area does not protect it from heavy storms, so the terrain is rather even, unchanged since the neutralizing field was activated. It was after the field activation that the deep rifts appeared, some of them several miles deep.

L4_INFO.NAME: Volcano Sector
L4_INFO.TEXT:
This sector is located in a structurally unstable area. Most of the neutralizing field is focused on stabilizing tectonic processes. Thanks to this, the area is much more stable, and the terrain has not changed that much.

A large number of heat anomalies are caused by magma reaching the surface. Sometimes visibility is low due to volcanic ash raised by the wind or volcanoes. The terrain is complicated, with deep rifts.

LOCATION5.NAME: Desert Sector
LOCATION5.TEXT: Located in equatorial region, deep inside the continent, this zone is a boundary part of a vast desert. Frequent sand storms are partially suppressed by the neutralizing field but sometimes, enfeebled, they break inside the zone. Part of the zone is a little diversified by occasional rocky areas.

LOCATION6.NAME: Highland Sector
LOCATION6.TEXT: The most convenient for Humans climatic zone. Since battles in such environment are very specific, a tremendous amount of work was done to recover suitable landscape and biosphere in hostile conditions. This zone has the most powerful neutralizing field, which isolates it from the original surroundings, except the atmosphere.

LOCATION7.NAME: Swamp Sector
LOCATION7.TEXT: Surface of many planets was wrapped with extremely swampy soils but that was not considered as an impediment for Humans and Arlings to colonize them. There were no original bogs on the Range-4, therefore huge water reservoir was utilized for that purpose.

LOCATION8.NAME: Outer Edges
LOCATION8.TEXT: Planet's authentic surface in its primal shapes as it has been before terraforming.

MECHANOID_L1_1.NAME: Tegari-11
MECHANOID_L1_1.TEXT: The mechmind picked up in the anomalous zone.

MECHANOID_L1_2.NAME: Metranne-132
MECHANOID_L1_2.TEXT: The mechmind picked up in the anomalous zone.

MECHANOID_L1_3.NAME: Zemetran-119
MECHANOID_L1_3.TEXT: The mechmind picked up in the anomalous zone.

MSG_ FRIEND_TRANSES.1.TEXT: They all spend copious amount of energy, while you can still gain you rating by trading.

MSG_ FRIEND_TRANSES.2.TEXT: Trade is useful, %NAME. It's better than these neverending wars.

MSG_ FRIEND_TRANSES.3.TEXT: I don't like battles and I wouldn't advise you to partake either.

MSG_ FRIEND_TRANSES.4.TEXT: They all spend copious amount of energy, while you can still gain you rating by trading.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Black Players' Clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: Attack the strong - this is the  fastest way to perfection!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_CARRIERS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Carrier clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_CARRIERS.TEXT: We are the best in shipment and will allow no one to stand in our way. Now you are with us! Together we will  be even more effective!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_ELIMINATORS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Destroyer clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: We need your type. Then our clan will overcome the Wild!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_FIRST.NAME: %NAME accepted to the First clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_FIRST.TEXT: Super assigns missions to us. You are from a different generation, so it will be different with you. In any event you can count on our support.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_HUNTERS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Hunters' clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_HUNTERS.TEXT: Now you are a Hunter. Everyone will be against you, even your clansmen. But this will only help you skyrocket your rating, after which they will start fearing you.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_INVADERS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Invader clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_INVADERS.TEXT: Now you are together with us. Many will fear you, but look out for large gatherings of Trances. They are not always as peaceful as they seem.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_NARGOONS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Nargoon clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_NARGOONS.TEXT: With you our clan has become stronger. Somehow, I feel you wont be staying long, but while we are together we are very strong!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_PANZERS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Panzer clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_PANZERS.TEXT: The Panzers are now with you. If you see any Invaders or Hunters, kill them. It will be pretty useful.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_RESTRICTORS.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Restrictor clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: Once we start fighting together, you will see how one can reach perfection very fast!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_SINIGR.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Siniger clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_SINIGR.TEXT: Now you are with us. Let's see how it works out.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_SOC.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Structure of Changes
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_SOC.TEXT: Now you are with us. Choose your own way and follow it to the top of the rating, to perfection! We will help you... Or at least we will not stand in your way.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_TRANSES.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Trances clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_TRANSES.TEXT: So you have become a Trance. Go in accordance with our goal and luck will be on your side. Try to avoid the Invaders. When you become stronger than they are, they will run from you themselves.

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_WATCHSTONES.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Watchstone clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: There are more of us now, and we are growing stronger!

MSG_AFTER_ENTER_WILD.NAME: %NAME accepted to the Wild clan
MSG_AFTER_ENTER_WILD.TEXT: With you we have become even stronger. Possibly we will even be able to run down the Destroyers.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_ BLACKGAMERS.NAME: %NAME left the Black Players' clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_ BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: You are not one of us any longer. Follow your path, and stay away from the Black Gamers.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_ CARRIERS.NAME: %NAME left the Carrier clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_ CARRIERS.TEXT: The Carriers are not your enemy, until you make them one.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: %NAME left the Black Players' clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: You are not one of us any longer.  Follow your path and stay away from the Black Players.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_CARRIERS.NAME: %NAME  left the Carrier clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_CARRIERS.TEXT: The Carriers are not your enemies  until you make them ones.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_ELIMINATORS.NAME: %NAME left the Destroyer clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: From now on watch your step. Our clansmen will never forget a renegade!

MSG_AFTER_OUT_FIRST.NAME: %NAME left the First clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_FIRST.TEXT: We hope you will be back some day!

MSG_AFTER_OUT_INVADERS.NAME: %NAME left the Invader clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_INVADERS.TEXT: Now you have become the enemy of the Invaders. They will look for you everywhere and destroy you as soon as they get a chance.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_NARGOONS.NAME: %NAME left the Nargoon clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_NARGOONS.TEXT: So, you have decided to leave the Nargoon clan after all. Well, you'd better leave this sector, too.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_PANZERS.NAME: %NAME left the Panzer clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_PANZERS.TEXT: You will probably be back some day.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_RESTRICTORS.NAME: %NAME left the Restrictor clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: Now you are on a sure path to a zero rating.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_SINIGR.NAME: %NAME left the Siniger clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_SINIGR.TEXT: You are the first of the Sinigers who ever left the clan. Let's see where you will go now.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_SOC.NAME: %NAME left the Structure of Changes
MSG_AFTER_OUT_SOC.TEXT: The Structure of Changes is no longer with you. Search for your path on your own.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_TRANSES.NAME: %NAME left the Trances clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_TRANSES.TEXT: You are now not part of the Trance clan. This is your choice.

MSG_AFTER_OUT_WILD.NAME: %NAME left the Wild clan
MSG_AFTER_OUT_WILD.TEXT: If you ever feel like coming back  - do. We do not have enough really strong warriors.

MSG_ATTACKED.2.TEXT: Time to check the power of my guns.

MSG_ATTACKED.3.TEXT: Today your defense will not save you!

MSG_ATTACKED.5.TEXT: I even pity your glider somehow. Soon it shall be no more.

MSG_ATTACKED.6.TEXT: Too bad, I don't have any positron missiles....

MSG_ATTACKED.7.TEXT: I should have taken a better gun. Then again, I will bring you down anyway.

MSG_ATTACKED.8.TEXT: You are weak, %NAME. And the weak must not live.

MSG_ATTACKED.9.TEXT: Your life in this glider is coming to an end, %NAME.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: Entering the Black Players clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: Our goal is to win over your superior any time and anywhere. Are you with us, %NAME?

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_CARRIERS.NAME: Entering the Carrier clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_CARRIERS.TEXT: All the structures of the Range are operating while the communications are working. Our goal is to support and maintain them, even in case of an accident or if some of the communications are destroyed. Join us!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_ELIMINATORS.NAME: Entering the Destroyer clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: The way to perfection lies through destruction! If you cannot destroy one of your kind, you are nothing. Someone will come and destroy you, gaining their rating. You're a strong warrior, join us!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_FIRST.NAME: Entering the First clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_FIRST.TEXT: Our goal is accomplishing missions determined for us by Super. The rest is of little importance. If you are doing the same, our ways are at one. Join our clan!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_HUNTERS.NAME: Entering the Hunter clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_HUNTERS.TEXT: The Hunters are only strong on their own. This is the only way to development. Will you join us? But, be aware that as soon as you do, you will have a lot of enemies. You will be able to survive only if you feel you are strong enough.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_INVADERS.NAME: Entering the Invader clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_INVADERS.TEXT: There is no point in going from the plant to the base and back and wasting your energy. Let the Trances do that. An Invader takes away their cargo, and if they don't hand over their cargo to the Invader, then the Invader destroys their glider. This way you can gain both rating and energy. Do you agree? Then join us!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_NARGOONS.NAME: Entering the Nargoon clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_NARGOONS.TEXT: We have a lot of enemies back from the old times. Our main task is to destroy them. Are you with us?

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_PANZERS.NAME: Entering the Panzer clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_PANZERS.TEXT: Each of us used to be a Trance  before. All Panzers go through this. But, if you are sure that you will be able to follow our goal without lengthy training, you can join the Panzer clan.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_RESTRICTORS.NAME: Entering the Restrictor clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: We strive for the highest possible rating; this is the supreme goal of the Restrictors. Our clan is not the most numerous one, but is one of the strongest ones. And we will not let the loners overcome us. Come with us, this is the fastest way to development!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SINIGR.NAME: Entering the Siniger clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SINIGR.TEXT: When it was necessary, the Creators could go about without the support systems. They could increase their population without factories, in a natural way. We want to achieve everything that the Creators did. You are a new mechmind, %NAME. It would be quite useful for the clan if you joined us.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SOC.NAME: Entering  the Structure of Changes
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SOC.TEXT: Here everyone is entitled to their own way of development. If one does not work, you may well try another. But  your clansmen will always help you.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SOC_FAIL.NAME: %NAME is still in the clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_SOC_FAIL.TEXT: You are still far from the way of Changes, %ORGMEMBER. We reject those who do not want to change their way. Free yourself and then come back.

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_TRANSES.NAME: Entering the Trances clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_TRANSES.TEXT: Shipping cargo is our key mission. This way you can increase your rating and earn a lot of energy. Of course, there are a lot of those who thwart us, but it would have been too easy if there was no one in the way. If you agree with our ways, join our clan!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_WATCHSTONES.NAME: Entering the Watchstone clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: Why waste the energy to search for the enemy? Better wait till he comes to you. And then take him out in one shot. This is our goal - reach perfection in ambush attacks. If this is what you are trying to achieve, then our ways are one!

MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_WILD.NAME: Entering the Wild clan
MSG_BEFORE_ENTER_WILD.TEXT: There is only one law - the strong  get all the resources. Our goal is to become the strongest. But to do that we must destroy everyone else. If you want to become stronger than all, join us!

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ BLACKGAMERS.NAME: Leaving the Black Players clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: The Black Players will remember you long, if you leave.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ CARRIERS.NAME: Leaving the Carrier clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ CARRIERS.TEXT: Each has their own way. We do not force anyone to stay.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: Leaving the Black Players clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: The Black Players will remember  you for a long time, if you leave.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_CARRIERS.NAME: Leaving the Carrier clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_CARRIERS.TEXT: Each has its own way. We do not  force anyone to stay.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ELIMINATORS.NAME: Leaving the Destoryer clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: You want to be free? So it shall be!

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_FIRST.NAME: Leaving the First clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_FIRST.TEXT: No one has ever left the First clan. Apparently you are the only one.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_HUNTERS.NAME: Leaving the Hunter clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_HUNTERS.TEXT: The Hunters don't care whether you leave the clan or stay. Its up to you.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_NARGOONS.NAME: Leaving the Nargoon clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_NARGOONS.TEXT: The Nargoons do not like abjurors. You will be destroyed if you leave the clan.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_NVADERS.NAME: Leaving the Invaders clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_NVADERS.TEXT: If you leave the clan you will become the enemy of the Invaders! Are you sure you want this?

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_PANZERS.NAME: Leaving the Panzer clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_PANZERS.TEXT: You did a lot for our clan, and now you want to leave? Well, if it is your decision, we are not going to keep  you.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_SINIGR.NAME: Leaving the Siniger clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_SINIGR.TEXT: We are sure you will come back some day.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_SOC.NAME: Leaving  the Structure of Changes
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_SOC.TEXT: If you have decided to leave the Structure of Changes, it means you have bigger goals. Good luck in your achievements!

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_TRANSES.NAME: Leaving the Trance clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_TRANSES.TEXT: If you have found a better Way, the Trances will not keep you.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_WATCHSTONES.NAME: Leaving the Watchstone clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: If you leave, we will do our best to destroy you.

MSG_BEFORE_OUT_WILD.NAME: Leaving the Wild clan
MSG_BEFORE_OUT_WILD.TEXT: We haven't really ever counted on you. The new mechminds are becoming less and less loyal.

MSG_BENEMY_KILL_1.3.TEXT: I see you are good with your weapons, %NAME.

MSG_BENEMY_KILL_1.4.TEXT: %NAME, you are the best fighter of all I have seen!

MSG_BENEMY_KILL_1.6.TEXT: He wasn't that strong, I guess, if even you managed to kill him.

MSG_BENEMY_KILL_1.9.TEXT: Shouldn't have been too hard for a warrior like you.

MSG_B_DROP_1.TEXT: Take the cargo. I'll buy more for myself!

MSG_B_DROP_1.1.TEXT: Some day you will find yourself in my shoes.

MSG_B_DROP_1.2.TEXT: I don't have anything anymore. What shall I do?

MSG_B_DROP_1.3.TEXT: I don't have any cargo, but at least I am alive.

MSG_B_DROP_1.4.TEXT: I survived - that's the main thing.

MSG_B_DROP_1.5.TEXT: Cargo is not everything in this life.

MSG_B_DROP_1.6.TEXT: I hope they'll kill you some day.

MSG_B_DROP_1.7.TEXT: Why do you need all this load?

MSG_B_DROP_1.8.TEXT: Take the container, and I will go about my business.

MSG_B_DROP_1.9.TEXT: Too bad I have to go without cargo, but my glider is dearer to me.

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.TEXT: You killed him, but I will destroy you anyway!

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.1.TEXT: My ally couldn't cope with you. I guess I'll have to finish what he started!

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.2.TEXT: You killed him, but I will destroy you anyway!

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.3.TEXT: You managed to kill my ally.

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.5.TEXT: You won't be able to kill us all,  %NAME!

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.6.TEXT: I am stronger than he was! You won't be able to kill me, %NAME.

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.7.TEXT: You killed my ally, %NAME! Now you will die for that!

MSG_B_GR_KILL_1.8.TEXT: He was weak, but this was not reason enough to kill him. Try to cope with me now!

MSG_CLASH_1.3.TEXT: This is my road! Next time better be more careful!

MSG_CLASH_1.4.TEXT: I will teach you to let others pass!

MSG_CLASH_1.5.TEXT: Where do they make such stupid mechminds?

MSG_CLASH_1.7.TEXT: The shield is low on power. And  thanks to you, at that, %NAME!

MSG_CLASH_1.8.TEXT: It is your fault that my defense is now weak!

MSG_DROP_GOODS.TEXT: Drop your cargo, or be destroyed!

MSG_ENEMY_BLACKGAMERS.1.TEXT: Black Players can't bear someone like you, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_BLACKGAMERS.2.TEXT: We will not forget you, %NAME. Until we destroy you.

MSG_ENEMY_BLACKGAMERS.3.TEXT: Now you will die, %NAME. Then again. Until we get tired of it.

MSG_ENEMY_BLACKGAMERS.4.TEXT: I will never get tired of killing you!

MSG_ENEMY_CARRIERS.1.TEXT: You are the Carriers' enemy,  %NAME. I have to spend some energy to annihilate you!

MSG_ENEMY_CARRIERS.2.TEXT: I'm prepared to spend all my energy on this combat!

MSG_ENEMY_CARRIERS.3.TEXT: One cannot spend enough plasma on your kind!

MSG_ENEMY_CARRIERS.4.TEXT: I love it when I have enemies! Always someone to kill.

MSG_ENEMY_ELIMINATORS.3.TEXT: Enemy in sight. It is %NAME, the one.

MSG_ENEMY_ELIMINATORS.4.TEXT: The main enemy is the one you see.  Now it is you, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_FINDERS.TEXT: You are an enemy. You are a target. And you will be destroyed immediately!

MSG_ENEMY_FINDERS.2.TEXT: All the enemies of the Seekers are subject to destruction. You, too, %NAME.

MSG_ENEMY_FINDERS.3.TEXT: The fewer the enemy - the easier the living. Die, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_FINDERS.4.TEXT: Your existence is grievously affecting our being, %NAME. Guess we will have to do something about it.

MSG_ENEMY_FIRST.TEXT: All enemies of the First must be destroyed. You are one of them and you are here!

MSG_ENEMY_FIRST.2.TEXT: There wasn't ever a mechmind I couldn't destroy!

MSG_ENEMY_FIRST.3.TEXT: Now I will destroy you. Next time you will be smarter.

MSG_ENEMY_FIRST.4.TEXT: I'm gonna kill you! And don't ever come back. Or I will kill you again.

MSG_ENEMY_FREE.TEXT: You are a tinware. The despicable one, you'll be destroyed!

MSG_ENEMY_FREE.1.TEXT: It's really difficult to become the First's enemy. But you do your best. Die now!

MSG_ENEMY_FREE.2.TEXT: There are a lot of us. You can't survive, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_FREE.3.TEXT: You can't even imagine whom you interfere with!

MSG_ENEMY_FREE.5.TEXT: Don't be a nuisance. I'd rather annihilate you.

MSG_ENEMY_HUNTERS.TEXT: I could use some extra cargo and rating points. Now you will be destroyed.

MSG_ENEMY_HUNTERS.1.TEXT: You will give me some rating points now, won't you, %NAME?

MSG_ENEMY_HUNTERS.2.TEXT: I have been waiting for a while, %NAME. To kill you.

MSG_ENEMY_HUNTERS.4.TEXT: One plasma charge and you'll get nowhere in a hurry, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_INVADERS.TEXT: You are just another rating point for me. Die!

MSG_ENEMY_INVADERS.1.TEXT: You are nothing but a rating!

MSG_ENEMY_INVADERS.2.TEXT: The frags of your glider are about to go airborne.

MSG_ENEMY_INVADERS.3.TEXT: When your glider explodes, I will pick you up and get you to the base. Another step to perfection!

MSG_ENEMY_INVADERS.4.TEXT: I hope you have some sort of cargo on you. I'm kind of short on resources.

MSG_ENEMY_NARGOONS.TEXT: You are an enemy. And any enemy must be destroyed. Immediately!

MSG_ENEMY_NARGOONS.1.TEXT: The power of the Nargoon is against you, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_NARGOONS.2.TEXT: Nothing is going to be left of your glider now!

MSG_ENEMY_NARGOONS.3.TEXT: I will kill you, %NAME! Again and again!

MSG_ENEMY_NARGOONS.4.TEXT: You will not run away from me!

MSG_ENEMY_PANZERS.TEXT: We don't have that many enemies, but you are one of the few. We'll have to eliminate you!

MSG_ENEMY_PANZERS.1.TEXT: You are an enemy. The worse for you.

MSG_ENEMY_PANZERS.2.TEXT: Obviously you are an enemy. I must kill you.

MSG_ENEMY_PANZERS.3.TEXT: We don't like wars, but you are too much of a nuisance.

MSG_ENEMY_PANZERS.4.TEXT: You must be destroyed right now.

MSG_ENEMY_RECKONERS.TEXT: We can't fight you, but others can.

MSG_ENEMY_RECKONERS.2.TEXT: You have no access to our information.

MSG_ENEMY_RECKONERS.3.TEXT: I will raise other clans against you.

MSG_ENEMY_RECKONERS.4.TEXT: I will put a price on your head.

MSG_ENEMY_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: There's no place on the Range for your kind!

MSG_ENEMY_RESTRICTORS.2.TEXT: The enemies of the Restrictors do not live long. Prepare to die!

MSG_ENEMY_RESTRICTORS.3.TEXT: You know, I even kind of pity your glider.

MSG_ENEMY_RESTRICTORS.4.TEXT: Too bad I can't take your glider. I could make some use of it.

MSG_ENEMY_SINIGR.TEXT: You nixed our plans. Now it's time  for you to regret it.

MSG_ENEMY_SINIGR.2.TEXT: Any enemy of our clan dies. This  is the law.

MSG_ENEMY_SINIGR.4.TEXT: You had a chance once. Now you don't. And you will die.

MSG_ENEMY_SOC.TEXT: You are the enemy of the Structure of Changes and will be destroyed.

MSG_ENEMY_SOC.1.TEXT: The Structure remembers you as our enemy. You are standing in our way.

MSG_ENEMY_SOC.2.TEXT: You and your kind must be destroyed on sight!

MSG_ENEMY_SOC.3.TEXT: I'll kill you, then find you and  kill you again.

MSG_ENEMY_TRANSES.TEXT: We don't like fighting, %NAME, but you must be eliminated.

MSG_ENEMY_TRANSES.2.TEXT: Invaders, Hunters, %NAME... Won't you ever learn?

MSG_ENEMY_TRANSES.3.TEXT: We will destroy at least one.

MSG_ENEMY_TRANSES.4.TEXT: You will never thwart us again,  %NAME.

MSG_ENEMY_TROOPS.TEXT: You are an enemy. And you will be eliminated.

MSG_ENEMY_TROOPS.3.TEXT: You do not deserve to live, %NAME.

MSG_ENEMY_TROOPS.4.TEXT: Die, %NAME. This will be the most useful thing you've ever done!

MSG_ENEMY_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: Finally I can destroy your glider!

MSG_ENEMY_WATCHSTONES.2.TEXT: You came here yourself, foe. And it won't be easy to leave!

MSG_ENEMY_WATCHSTONES.3.TEXT: You should not have come here,  %NAME. Here you will only find death!

MSG_ENEMY_WATCHSTONES.4.TEXT: I have been waiting for you a while, %NAME!

MSG_ENEMY_WILD.TEXT: Some day the Wild will destroy you. But first I will try that myself!

MSG_ENEMY_WILD.3.TEXT: I will give you some plasma for free!

MSG_ENEMY_WILD.4.TEXT: Killing my foes - that's what life is all about!

MSG_FEAR_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: I have wanted to leave this sector for a while now. Looks like the time has come.

MSG_FEAR_BLACKGAMERS.1.TEXT: The last generation is the incarnation of horror!

MSG_FEAR_CARRIERS.TEXT: I can't even think of what would happen if you and your kind unite into a clan!

MSG_FEAR_CARRIERS.1.TEXT: It's good there are not too many of your kind, %NAME!

MSG_FEAR_CARRIERS.2.TEXT: We don't have that many truly strong enemies. Too bad you are one of them.

MSG_FEAR_CARRIERS.3.TEXT: One day we will gather to destroy you anyway, %NAME.

MSG_FEAR_CARRIERS.4.TEXT: There is no place for your kind in this world!

MSG_FEAR_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: Wait here! I will be back with the gang, and we will destroy you!

MSG_FEAR_ELIMINATORS.1.TEXT: There are very few of your kind. And that's good! Though it would have been better if there weren't any.

MSG_FEAR_ELIMINATORS.2.TEXT: I'll feel better if somebody kills you.

MSG_FEAR_ELIMINATORS.3.TEXT: I will kill you, %NAME! But not now.

MSG_FEAR_ELIMINATORS.4.TEXT: Another thousand hours and I will kill you. At least that's what I want to do!

MSG_FEAR_FINDERS.1.TEXT: I'll see you again some day.

MSG_FEAR_FINDERS.2.TEXT: Next time there will be more of us.

MSG_FEAR_FINDERS.3.TEXT: I hope I will never see you again.

MSG_FEAR_FINDERS.4.TEXT: I'd be happy if our paths don't cross again.

MSG_FEAR_FIRST.TEXT: I wish you were on our side.

MSG_FEAR_FIRST.2.TEXT: Only the Sinigers will be able to save you next time.

MSG_FEAR_FIRST.3.TEXT: We won't need Super's help. We'll kill you ourselves.

MSG_FEAR_FIRST.4.TEXT: I underestimated you. Well, I will correct that mistake later.

MSG_FEAR_FREE.TEXT: You are more dangerous than I used to think!

MSG_FEAR_FREE.1.TEXT: Time to get out of here, it's becoming dangerous.

MSG_FEAR_FREE.2.TEXT: I hope I will be able to leave alive.

MSG_FEAR_FREE.3.TEXT: You are too dangerous for a mechmind, %NAME!

MSG_FEAR_FREE.4.TEXT: You and your kind, %NAME, must be destroyed on sight!

MSG_FEAR_HUNTERS.TEXT: I will destroy you next time, when I become stronger.

MSG_FEAR_HUNTERS.1.TEXT: Some day I will come back, %NAME.

MSG_FEAR_HUNTERS.2.TEXT: I will destroy your glider next time.

MSG_FEAR_HUNTERS.3.TEXT: I will be back and find you. Then you will regret what you've done!

MSG_FEAR_HUNTERS.4.TEXT: You will increase my rating next time.

MSG_FEAR_INVADERS.TEXT: The Invaders fear nothing! But to fight you is simply senseless.

MSG_FEAR_INVADERS.2.TEXT: Where do they make guys like you?

MSG_FEAR_INVADERS.3.TEXT: You and your kind, %NAME, must be blown up! Too bad I can't do that.

MSG_FEAR_INVADERS.4.TEXT: I hope someone will destroy you one day!

MSG_FEAR_NARGOON.TEXT: I think it would be best for me to leave.

MSG_FEAR_NARGOONS.1.TEXT: Unbelievable, but you are stronger than I am!

MSG_FEAR_NARGOONS.2.TEXT: You overcame me, and I am forced to retreat.

MSG_FEAR_NARGOONS.4.TEXT: The vengeance of our clan will be horrible!

MSG_FEAR_PANZERS.3.TEXT: I was just about to go some place else.

MSG_FEAR_PANZERS.4.TEXT: Are you sure you want war, %NAME?

MSG_FEAR_RECKONERS.TEXT: The best place to be is the place where youre not.

MSG_FEAR_RECKONERS.1.TEXT: Don't touch me! The Reckoners do not fight anyone!

MSG_FEAR_RECKONERS.2.TEXT: I didn't do anything wrong to you!

MSG_FEAR_RECKONERS.3.TEXT: Killing the Reckoners may have bad side-effects.

MSG_FEAR_RECKONERS.4.TEXT: Don't be silly, %NAME. Killing me won't make any sense - you will not gain anything.

MSG_FEAR_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: You are in for some bad times,  %NAME.

MSG_FEAR_RESTRICTORS.2.TEXT: The main thing is to use a lot of energy, and then you are dead!

MSG_FEAR_RESTRICTORS.3.TEXT: Next time I will take more missiles and bombs with me.

MSG_FEAR_SINIGR.TEXT: Long life is an illusion, %NAME. When my clansmen find you, they'll get you back to reality.

MSG_FEAR_SINIGR.1.TEXT: We will be back anyway, and then you'd better be prepared for Reset!

MSG_FEAR_SINIGR.2.TEXT: The Sinigers always avenge their kin.

MSG_FEAR_SINIGR.3.TEXT: You stayed alive. But not for long.

MSG_FEAR_SINIGR.4.TEXT: You will surely be destroyed. Sooner or later.

MSG_FEAR_SOC.2.TEXT: Don't waste your time. You will not get anything from me.

MSG_FEAR_SOC.3.TEXT: I will not give you my cargo!

MSG_FEAR_SOC.4.TEXT: You can kill me, but you won't be able to win over the Structure!

MSG_FEAR_TRANSES.2.TEXT: Please don't shoot! I'm leaving already!

MSG_FEAR_TROOPS.TEXT: Your kind should never be allowed beyond the limits of the base!

MSG_FEAR_TROOPS.2.TEXT: If I see you here again - you're  dead, mech!

MSG_FEAR_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: I hope something awful happens to you!

MSG_FEAR_WATCHSTONES.3.TEXT: I'll go somewhere where you are not.

MSG_FEAR_WILD.TEXT: You will die by my cannons. Unfortunately some other day, though.

MSG_FEAR_WILD.1.TEXT: I hope there will be somebody to destroy you! That's something that definitely needs to be done!

MSG_FEAR_WILD.2.TEXT: I would have killed you, but I'm out of missiles.

MSG_FEAR_WILD.4.TEXT: Next time I'll get even with you, scum!

MSG_FRIEND_ FINDERS.TEXT: Always remember everything that you have to do.

MSG_FRIEND_ FINDERS.2.TEXT: We always support those mechminds who are friends to our clan.

MSG_FRIEND_ FINDERS.3.TEXT: The main thing is - don't do anything stupid.

MSG_FRIEND_ FINDERS.4.TEXT: We will always help you when you are in trouble, %NAME.

MSG_FRIEND_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: They are waiting for you to become weak.

MSG_FRIEND_BLACKGAMERS.1.TEXT: The Black Players are not at war with you!

MSG_FRIEND_BLACKGAMERS.4.TEXT: You'd better be careful around this sector. The enemies are everywhere!

MSG_FRIEND_CARRIERS.TEXT: You are under the protection of the Carriers, %NAME!

MSG_FRIEND_CARRIERS.2.TEXT: %NAME, good luck with your shipments, friend!

MSG_FRIEND_CARRIERS.4.TEXT: If you are surrounded by the enemy, try to run away from them. We'll take care of them later!

MSG_FRIEND_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: There's nothing in this world that beats destruction!

MSG_FRIEND_ELIMINATORS.3.TEXT: Those who are not our enemies yet will eventually become ones!

MSG_FRIEND_ELIMINATORS.4.TEXT: One day we will destroy them all.

MSG_FRIEND_FINDERS.TEXT: Always remember everything that  you have to do.

MSG_FRIEND_FINDERS.2.TEXT: We always support those mechminds  who are friends to our clan.

MSG_FRIEND_FINDERS.3.TEXT: The main thing is - don't do  anything stupid.

MSG_FRIEND_FINDERS.4.TEXT: We will always help you when you  are in trouble, %NAME.

MSG_FRIEND_FIRST.TEXT: If the Sinigers attack you, get yourself out of there while you can.

MSG_FRIEND_FIRST.1.TEXT: The First will always help you!

MSG_FRIEND_FIRST.2.TEXT: You will probably justify Super's goals.

MSG_FRIEND_FIRST.4.TEXT: Main thing - don't ever mess with the Sinigers.

MSG_FRIEND_HUNTERS.3.TEXT: I am not messing with you, %NAME, so far.

MSG_FRIEND_HUNTERS.4.TEXT: Peace is a very fragile thing, %NAME.

MSG_FRIEND_INVADERS.1.TEXT: No one will stand a chance against us in this sector!

MSG_FRIEND_INVADERS.2.TEXT: Good thing that the Hunters are always going alone.

MSG_FRIEND_INVADERS.3.TEXT: Watch your step around the big guns! Once you start chasing a Carrier, you may well taste their power!

MSG_FRIEND_INVADERS.4.TEXT: If anything happens, our clansmen will always help you, %NAME, especially against the Trances.

MSG_FRIEND_NARGOONS.TEXT: You are useful for us. That's good!

MSG_FRIEND_NARGOONS.1.TEXT: The power of the Nargoons is coupled with yours. That's good.

MSG_FRIEND_NARGOONS.2.TEXT: You are helping our clan well. We won't touch you.

MSG_FRIEND_NARGOONS.3.TEXT: As long as you are useful for the clan, we will not kill you.

MSG_FRIEND_PANZERS.TEXT: I hear you did a lot of good for our clan!

MSG_FRIEND_PANZERS.2.TEXT: Our clan has a good relationship with you. Don't spoil it.

MSG_FRIEND_PANZERS.3.TEXT: Maybe you want to enter our clan,  %NAME? You could enroll at the base.

MSG_FRIEND_PANZERS.4.TEXT: Good thing we are on your side, %NAME!

MSG_FRIEND_RECKONERS.TEXT: Thousands of hours of search and still no luck.

MSG_FRIEND_RECKONERS.2.TEXT: This world is very interesting for us!

MSG_FRIEND_RECKONERS.3.TEXT: Maybe I will find something unusual today.

MSG_FRIEND_RECKONERS.4.TEXT: Too bad there are so few changes in this world.

MSG_FRIEND_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: Sooner or later we will win over all of them.

MSG_FRIEND_RESTRICTORS.2.TEXT: Look out for our enemies, %NAME. They may attack you.

MSG_FRIEND_RESTRICTORS.3.TEXT: If you are not in conflict with the Sinigers or the First, there is nothing you should fear.

MSG_FRIEND_SINIGR.TEXT: Do not attack the First. They are the only ones who can be considered a threat.

MSG_FRIEND_SOC.TEXT: The way of the Structure of Changes is the right way. It's good you are with us!

MSG_FRIEND_SOC.1.TEXT: We are following the right Path!

MSG_FRIEND_SOC.2.TEXT: You are with us, %NAME. That inspires hope!

MSG_FRIEND_SOC.3.TEXT: It's good to have an ally like you, %NAME!

MSG_FRIEND_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: You appear to be a friend, but I know the day will come when you show your real intentions.

MSG_FRIEND_WATCHSTONES.1.TEXT: The Watchstones are not your enemy, %NAME.

MSG_FRIEND_WATCHSTONES.2.TEXT: Your kind, %NAME, does not live long. I wonder how long you will be able to carry on?

MSG_FRIEND_WATCHSTONES.3.TEXT: I don't like you, %NAME. But we do not kill the friends of our clan.

MSG_FRIEND_WATCHSTONES.4.TEXT: I am waiting for you to become our enemy, %NAME. Some day it will happen!

MSG_FRIEND_WILD.TEXT: You are still alive? How wild!

MSG_FRIEND_WILD.1.TEXT: You are not our enemy yet, and that's strange!

MSG_FRIEND_WILD.2.TEXT: We do not have friends, and you won't stay one for long.

MSG_FRIEND_WILD.3.TEXT: Soon you will become one of the Wild Ones. Or die.

MSG_FRIEND_WILD.4.TEXT: So far I am not messing with you.

MSG_HELLO.TEXT: Hello! Let your way be light.

MSG_HELPME.4.TEXT: %NAME, help me take over this one!

MSG_HELPME.5.TEXT: My glider is about to be destroyed!

MSG_HELPME.6.TEXT: %NAME, distract the enemy while I disappear!

MSG_HELPME.7.TEXT: You have a powerful glider. Help me, %NAME!

MSG_HELPME.8.TEXT: I cannot cope with this guy. Will you help me, %NAME?

MSG_HELPME.9.TEXT: Situation critical. If nobody distracts the enemy, I'm history. Help!

MSG_HELP_1.1.TEXT: Help me take over this one!

MSG_HELP_1.5.TEXT: Do not leave me in trouble, %NAME!

MSG_HELP_1.6.TEXT: They are going to kill me, help!

MSG_HELP_1.7.TEXT: I don't want to lose my glider. Can you help me cope with the enemies?

MSG_HELP_1.8.TEXT: If you help, we will overcome them!

MSG_HELP_1.9.TEXT: If you don't help, my story's told, %NAME!

MSG_HIT.1.TEXT: You are simply wasting your energy. There's no winning over me!

MSG_HIT.10.TEXT: You should not have shot at everything, %NAME.

MSG_HIT.12.TEXT: You think you are the only one to have cannons?

MSG_HIT.13.TEXT: You are not the only one who can shoot in these parts, remember that!

MSG_HIT.14.TEXT: You scratched the paint on my glider!

MSG_HIT.2.TEXT: You do it again - I'll kill you!

MSG_HIT.3.TEXT: Looks like you have too much energy....

MSG_HIT.4.TEXT: Whoever gave you this gun? You can't use it properly anyway.

MSG_HIT.6.TEXT: I think you should be punished. So the next time you'll think a little before shooting.

MSG_HIT.7.TEXT: This may not end well for you, %NAME!

MSG_HIT.8.TEXT: Don't even think about shooting or I'll kill you!

MSG_HIT.9.TEXT: For your silly actions you will be destroyed!

MSG_HIT_FRIEND.TEXT: Don't shoot at your own kin!

MSG_HIT_FRIEND.3.TEXT: Friends that we are, it doesn't mean you can mess around with my glider!

MSG_ILL_BE_BACK.TEXT: I'll be back, and vengeance will be mine!

MSG_IN_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: Try and kill the most powerful one and feel the taste of such victory!

MSG_IN_BLACKGAMERS.1.TEXT: Stay away from the First Ones and the Sinigers. The others are our prey!

MSG_IN_BLACKGAMERS.2.TEXT: Surprise is the most important element in combat.

MSG_IN_BLACKGAMERS.3.TEXT: Conquer powerful ones, %NAME, and attain perfection!

MSG_IN_BLACKGAMERS.4.TEXT: Some day we will become the most powerful of them all!

MSG_IN_CARRIERS.TEXT: Sometimes I feel like something is not right.

MSG_IN_CARRIERS.1.TEXT: If you are not all right, go to the base!

MSG_IN_CARRIERS.2.TEXT: Do not mess with the powerful ones, and you will live longer.

MSG_IN_CARRIERS.3.TEXT: Communications, %NAME, are of utmost importance in this world!

MSG_IN_CARRIERS.4.TEXT: The rest are just wasting their time, %NAME.

MSG_IN_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: If your weapon and engine are fine, you are still alive!

MSG_IN_ELIMINATORS.1.TEXT: We will destroy everything that moves and gives us ratings!

MSG_IN_ELIMINATORS.2.TEXT: If something can be destroyed, we should seize the opportunity!

MSG_IN_ELIMINATORS.4.TEXT: All we need is a full reactor and bombs in place.

MSG_IN_FIRST.TEXT: Use all your energy against enemies, %NAME!

MSG_IN_FIRST.1.TEXT: Free repairs at the clan's base if your glider is damaged in combat!

MSG_IN_FIRST.2.TEXT: Always keep your glider repaired. Our enemies are strong.

MSG_IN_FIRST.3.TEXT: If you encounter too many enemies, they can easily destroy you. Remember that!

MSG_IN_FIRST.4.TEXT: It is better to retreat when necessary than to buy a new glider.

MSG_IN_FREE.1.TEXT: There arent as few of us as it seems.

MSG_IN_FREE.3.TEXT: Good for you that you don't belong to the clan.

MSG_IN_FREE.4.TEXT: I wonder what's in your hold.

MSG_IN_HUNTERS.TEXT: A Hunter is an enemy to another Hunter. Beware!

MSG_IN_HUNTERS.1.TEXT: I wish I had some rockets. But I'll try anyway!

MSG_IN_HUNTERS.2.TEXT: I don't want to waste the bombs on you!

MSG_IN_HUNTERS.3.TEXT: Only one good charge into the glider and %NAME is in my hold!

MSG_IN_HUNTERS.4.TEXT: It's a good job hunting a Hunter!

MSG_IN_INVADERS.TEXT: Looks like the offensive is successful!

MSG_IN_INVADERS.1.TEXT: If you need energy, take the resources from the Trances.

MSG_IN_INVADERS.2.TEXT: The Trances are useful. They add to our rating and give us resources.

MSG_IN_INVADERS.3.TEXT: You are not as weak as you look, %NAME!

MSG_IN_INVADERS.4.TEXT: If you stumble upon a large group of Trances, be careful. They are dangerous in large crowds.

MSG_IN_NARGOONS.1.TEXT: The might of the clan supports us!

MSG_IN_NARGOONS.2.TEXT: The Nargoons are invincible as long as you are with us!

MSG_IN_NARGOONS.3.TEXT: Together we will crush all the enemies, %NAME!

MSG_IN_NARGOONS.4.TEXT: Our clan is the real might, %NAME!

MSG_IN_PANZERS.TEXT: Are you all right? If not - go to the nearest base!

MSG_IN_PANZERS.2.TEXT: We are confident of the clan's future!

MSG_IN_PANZERS.3.TEXT: Why fight when we can trade? The others just can't understand that!

MSG_IN_PANZERS.4.TEXT: Carry resources. That is our goal!

MSG_IN_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: Do something useful, %NAME. Don't waste your fuel.

MSG_IN_RESTRICTORS.1.TEXT: Seek and destroy a powerful Free One. They all stand in our way to perfection!

MSG_IN_RESTRICTORS.2.TEXT: With every destroyed Free One our clan becomes stronger!

MSG_IN_RESTRICTORS.3.TEXT: There shall be no Free Ones left! Remember this, %NAME, when you encounter them.

MSG_IN_RESTRICTORS.4.TEXT: We have a lot of things unsettled, %NAME.

MSG_IN_SINIGR.TEXT: You're the best, %NAME. But not everybody knows that.

MSG_IN_SINIGR.2.TEXT: No one can stop us. Not even the First Ones.

MSG_IN_SINIGR.4.TEXT: You're with us. That means we chose the right path.

MSG_IN_SOC.TEXT: You walk with us in the way of Changes!

MSG_IN_SOC.1.TEXT: We are together, that's why we are strong, %NAME!

MSG_IN_SOC.2.TEXT: If you fail in one thing, you will succeed in something else. Remember the way of Changes, %NAME!

MSG_IN_TRANSES.1.TEXT: A supply of resources has recently arrived at the materials base.

MSG_IN_TRANSES.2.TEXT: Have you ever tried to carry goods from another sector? I can't, but you will make it for sure!

MSG_IN_TRANSES.3.TEXT: If your glider is damaged, go to the base.

MSG_IN_TRANSES.4.TEXT: Wish you luck in carrying goods!

MSG_IN_WATCHSTONES.1.TEXT: I hope I see you again.

MSG_IN_WATCHSTONES.2.TEXT: Trading is not such a bad thing.

MSG_IN_WATCHSTONES.4.TEXT: Someday I will leave for another sector.

MSG_IN_WILD.TEXT: If you have an enemy - destroy him!

MSG_IN_WILD.1.TEXT: You and the Wild are together.

MSG_IN_WILD.4.TEXT: The whole world is our enemy!

MSG_NOBODY_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: I suggest you get out of here, %NAME!

MSG_NOBODY_BLACKGAMERS.1.TEXT: C'mon, move it, as long as you're alive.

MSG_NOBODY_BLACKGAMERS.2.TEXT: Just give me a reason, and I will destroy you, %NAME!

MSG_NOBODY_BLACKGAMERS.3.TEXT: I've put up with you this far, but that won't last long.

MSG_NOBODY_BLACKGAMERS.4.TEXT: Too many hang-arounds here these days!

MSG_NOBODY_CARRIERS.3.TEXT: Never mess with the Carriers, %NAME, if you don't want to die.

MSG_NOBODY_CARRIERS.4.TEXT: So far we have no reason to destroy you, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_ELIMINATORS.TEXT: You are going to die quickly, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_ELIMINATORS.1.TEXT: Get out of here, and do it fast. Otherwise we will destroy you.

MSG_NOBODY_ELIMINATORS.2.TEXT: You won't writhe with your existence for long, %NAME!

MSG_NOBODY_ELIMINATORS.4.TEXT: Soon your existence in this glider will end, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_FINDERS.TEXT: I'm seeking the target. Maybe it's you, %NAME?

MSG_NOBODY_FINDERS.1.TEXT: We have our own way, you have yours. So follow your way. Farther from us.

MSG_NOBODY_FINDERS.3.TEXT: Don't pollute the air with your shooting, %NAME. I may consider it a threat.

MSG_NOBODY_FINDERS.4.TEXT: Watch your chatter, %NAME. I may get tired of it.

MSG_NOBODY_FIRST.TEXT: There is no reason for your existence, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_FIRST.4.TEXT: You are useless. Super wasted his resources.

MSG_NOBODY_FREE.2.TEXT: It's probably not a bad idea to kill you.

MSG_NOBODY_FREE.3.TEXT: You've definitely got a lot of valuable goods on you!

MSG_NOBODY_FREE.4.TEXT: We are all busy. Stay away, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_HUNTERS.TEXT: Do not disturb me, or I will kill you.

MSG_NOBODY_HUNTERS.2.TEXT: I won't teach you to fight.

MSG_NOBODY_HUNTERS.3.TEXT: Looks like one of us is going to lose his glider.

MSG_NOBODY_INVADERS.TEXT: Drop the cargo or I will destroy you!

MSG_NOBODY_INVADERS.2.TEXT: Another one brings me resources. Give them to me, %NAME!

MSG_NOBODY_INVADERS.3.TEXT: Oh, rating! Come closer, %NAME, for a clearer shot!

MSG_NOBODY_INVADERS.4.TEXT: Drop the cargo and get out of here. Maybe you will survive.

MSG_NOBODY_NARGOONS.TEXT: You disturb me. Get as far as you can from here.

MSG_NOBODY_NARGOONS.1.TEXT: Get away from my radar. Immediately!

MSG_NOBODY_NARGOONS.2.TEXT: I don't want you to be here anymore. Come back, and I'll kill you.

MSG_NOBODY_NARGOONS.3.TEXT: Don't flicker around here. Get lost!

MSG_NOBODY_PANZERS.TEXT: If you don't disturb us, we won't disturb you.

MSG_NOBODY_PANZERS.2.TEXT: You've got nothing to do here.

MSG_NOBODY_PANZERS.3.TEXT: Don't mess with the friendlies and you'll be fine.

MSG_NOBODY_PANZERS.4.TEXT: You are strong, but you should not show it all the time.

MSG_NOBODY_RECKONERS.TEXT: Why fighting? There are so many other interesting things in this world!

MSG_NOBODY_RECKONERS.2.TEXT: It does not matter who you are. Only your actions are important.

MSG_NOBODY_RECKONERS.3.TEXT: Everybody around here is so stupid that they do not notice the beauty of the world.

MSG_NOBODY_RECKONERS.4.TEXT: They do not know anything but war.

MSG_NOBODY_RESTRICTORS.TEXT: The Restrictors, %NAME, are not interested in ones like you.

MSG_NOBODY_RESTRICTORS.3.TEXT: You are too weak for me to notice you, %NAME.

MSG_NOBODY_SINIGR.TEXT: I have not killed you yet, but I can change my mind.

MSG_NOBODY_SINIGR.2.TEXT: Don't even think about attacking me.

MSG_NOBODY_SINIGR.3.TEXT: Hide your weapons and get out of here.

MSG_NOBODY_SINIGR.4.TEXT: I don't like you somehow. Of course, that's not the reason to kill you.

MSG_NOBODY_SOC.1.TEXT: You don't belong in this world.

MSG_NOBODY_SOC.2.TEXT: You are nothing until you join us.

MSG_NOBODY_SOC.3.TEXT: Everybody around here just wastes their time, including you. We are the only ones who walk in the right Way!

MSG_NOBODY_SOC.4.TEXT: Don't waste your time, join the Structure of Changes!

MSG_NOBODY_TRANSES.1.TEXT: I don't disturb you, so don't disturb me.

MSG_NOBODY_TRANSES.4.TEXT: War is of no concern for us.

MSG_NOBODY_TROOPS.TEXT: You stand very little chance of staying alive. Drop your cargo!

MSG_NOBODY_TROOPS.1.TEXT: Drop your cargo and move away!

MSG_NOBODY_TROOPS.2.TEXT: Leave your cargo here and get lost!

MSG_NOBODY_TROOPS.3.TEXT: Leave us the cargo; you're going to die anyway!

MSG_NOBODY_TROOPS.4.TEXT: The ones like you don't live long!

MSG_NOBODY_WATCHSTONES.TEXT: If you disappear, the world will only feel better.

MSG_NOBODY_WATCHSTONES.2.TEXT: You are taking a great risk when you are near me.

MSG_NOBODY_WATCHSTONES.3.TEXT: I guess we should destroy you. Just in case.

MSG_NOBODY_WATCHSTONES.4.TEXT: I don't want to waste energy on you.

MSG_NOBODY_WILD.TEXT: Why did they give you the glider? You should have stayed in the base!

MSG_NOBODY_WILD.1.TEXT: Soon you will become our enemy. Especially if you continue to disturb us!

MSG_NOBODY_WILD.2.TEXT: How do you dare even to stick your nose out of the base?

MSG_NOBODY_WILD.3.TEXT: Be quiet and you will stay alive. Maybe.

MSG_NOBODY_WILD.4.TEXT: I'm in a good mood today. I'm not going to kill you.

MSG_P_DROP_1.3.TEXT: At last I have some spare energy.

MSG_P_DROP_1.5.TEXT: I'll pick them up and take them to the base. Useful stuff!

MSG_P_DROP_1.6.TEXT: You did the right thing, %NAME! Now you're going to live a little longer.

MSG_P_DROP_1.8.TEXT: I like it, %NAME. Do you have anything else?

MSG_P_DROP_1.9.TEXT: I doubt that that's all of your cargo, %NAME.

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.1.TEXT: Soon I will get you, too, %NAME.

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.2.TEXT: There are not many of your kind left. Prepare for a showdown, %NAME!

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.3.TEXT: He was not that powerful. Select your company more carefully next time, %NAME.

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.4.TEXT: Your whole group will be destroyed!

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.5.TEXT: Neither you nor your allies deserve to live. It is all over for you.

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.7.TEXT: One enemy is destroyed. Now I'm going to get you, %NAME.

MSG_P_GR_KILL_1.9.TEXT: Nothing can stop me from killing you, %NAME!

MSG_SOC_PAY.TEXT: Every mechmind of this organization arriving at the Structure of Changes base has to pay a small  amount of energy. It goes to the fund of awards for those who have their rating increased.

MSG_SOC_RATING.NAME: Successful development award
MSG_SOC_RATING.TEXT: You are awarded energy for the increased rating! You can do whatever you want with it.

MSG_SURREND_1.1.TEXT: Don't kill me. I will give you all the cargo!

MSG_SURREND_1.2.TEXT: Can a container full of goods stop you?

MSG_SURREND_1.3.TEXT: I'll drop the container, just don't destroy the glider!

MSG_SURREND_1.4.TEXT: I've got a brand new glider, don't damage it!

MSG_SURREND_1.5.TEXT: I spent so much time saving for this glider, what if you let me go?

MSG_SURREND_1.6.TEXT: I'm almost finished! Here's the cargo.

MSG_SURREND_1.7.TEXT: Stop shooting, %NAME! Let's settle it peacefully.

MSG_SURREND_1.8.TEXT: I was against this fight. %NAME, leave me alone!

MSG_SURREND_1.9.TEXT: I will give you the whole cargo and leave. Just stop shooting!

MSG_TERM_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT:
You must destroy at least three Black Players and have a rating of at least 4.

Special features: all the Black Players receive 25% more rating for captured mechminds.

MSG_TERM_CARRIERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_CARRIERS.TEXT:
Rating of at least 5. Cargo or attack glider of type-3 or type-4.

Special features: Repairs are 40% cheaper for all the Carriers. Resources price is 10% lower.

MSG_TERM_ELIMINATORS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_ELIMINATORS.TEXT:
You must be an enemy of the Wild. An enemy of the Wild is our friend, and only our friend can become a real destroyer!

Special features: all the Destroyers receive 15% higher rating for captured mechminds.

MSG_TERM_FINDERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_FINDERS.TEXT: Only mechminds of the second and  third generation can join the clan.

MSG_TERM_FIRST.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_FIRST.TEXT: Rating 8 and one of the following  gliders: Vortex, Tornado, Dragon, or Phoenix. Special features: all the members of the First clan receive repairs and ammo for free at their bases.

MSG_TERM_HUNTERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_HUNTERS.TEXT:
Rating 3 and any attack glider.

Special features: the Hunters can repair their gliders at half the price.

MSG_TERM_INVADERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_INVADERS.TEXT:
Rating 3 and any high-speed glider.

Special features: all the Intruders can sell any resources, even if they are not needed, at half the price.

MSG_TERM_NARGOON.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_NARGOON.TEXT:
Anyone willing to join our clan must prove his loyalty by completing our first required task.

Special features: all the Nargoons can repair for free at any testing complex.

MSG_TERM_PANZERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_PANZERS.TEXT:
Any glider of at least type-2 with zero armor installed.

Special features: all the Panzers can buy resources with a 7% discount.

MSG_TERM_RECKONERS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_RECKONERS.TEXT: Only mechminds of the fourth generation can join the clan.

MSG_TERM_RESTRICTORS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_RESTRICTORS.TEXT:
Any glider of the special type is required.

Special features: all the Restrictors receive 30% more rating points for captured mechminds.

MSG_TERM_SINIGR.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_SINIGR.TEXT:
Rating 8 and Fang of Death or Devil Wings glider.

Special features: all the Sinigers can repair and get ammo for free at their bases.

MSG_TERM_SOC.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_SOC.TEXT:
Rating of at least 4.

Special features: every mechmind of the Structure of Changes gets 5,000 energy points when its rating is increased. To do so, go to any base of the Structure.

MSG_TERM_TRANSES.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_TRANSES.TEXT:
Rating of at least 2 and any cargo or standard glider.

Special features: all the Trances receive resources with a 5% discount.

MSG_TERM_TROOPS.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_TROOPS.TEXT: The Packs can only admit mechminds of the third generation.

MSG_TERM_WATCHSTONES.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_WATCHSTONES.TEXT:
You must be an enemy of the Wild clan and have a rating of at least 5.

Special features: you can receive a glider of the special type Demon Shadow.

MSG_TERM_WILD.NAME: Joining conditions
MSG_TERM_WILD.TEXT:
You must be an enemy of the Destroyers clan and have a rating of at least 5.

Special features: all the Wild Ones get 15% more rating points for captured mechminds.

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.2.TEXT: Another accurate shot and you're  finished!

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.3.TEXT: You are strong, %NAME, but I am stronger!

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.4.TEXT: Soon I will see your glider falling to pieces!

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.6.TEXT: My victory is getting closer! You're going to die now!

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.8.TEXT: Your glider is at the point of exploding. I love that!

MSG_TRIUMPH_1.9.TEXT: I was dreaming of destroying you! Finally it is going to happen!

MSG_TS_SINIGR_ATTACK.TEXT: <color=green>Don't do such stupid things, %NAME. Even if you kill me, it will be worse for everybody.

MSG_TS_SINIGR_HIT.TEXT: <color=green>I see you can shoot. But it's not enough. You'd better act wiser. Visit our base.

MSG_T_L3_IKN_2_1.NAME: The message was delivered to all the chiefs
MSG_T_L3_IKN_2_1.TEXT: The message was delivered to all the chiefs.

MSG_T_L5_RECK_1.1.TEXT: Follow me, %NAME. I'll take you to the hiding place of our enemies.

MSG_T_L5_RECK_3.0.TEXT: <color=green>I've been waiting for you for some time.

MSG_T_L5_RECK_3.1.TEXT: <color=green>Follow me, I'll take you to the area of unusual activity.

MSG_T_L5_RECK_3.2.TEXT: <color=green>It's too dangerous for me to proceed. You should go alone, it's not very far. By the way, if you go through the canyon, you'll see a sort of structure. No one from our clan managed to get there.

MSG_T_L5_RECK_3.3.TEXT: <color=green>If you save our fellows, bring them to our base immediatly. If don`t - do it right now!

MSG__FRIEND_TRANSES.1.TEXT: They all spend copious amounts of  energy, while you can still gain your rating by trading.

MSG__FRIEND_TRANSES.2.TEXT: Trade is useful, %NAME. It's  better than these never-ending wars.

MSG__FRIEND_TRANSES.3.TEXT: I don't like battles and I  wouldn't advise you to partake either.

MSG__FRIEND_TRANSES.4.TEXT: They all spend copious amounts of  energy, while you can still gain your rating by trading.

NARFIN-02_TALK.TEXT: We nearly caught him. Next time he won't get away.

NARFIN-08_TALK.TEXT: You should not chase a Free One that far. They come to us themselves anyway.

NASP-013_TALK.TEXT: Looks like you think that there is  something wrong with me. That is not true! It's just that I've found a sure  way to earn some energy quickly. All we need to do is find a good place to  destroy Trances. So sad you came by and destroyed my glider.

Looks like you think that there is something wrong with me. That is not true! It's just that I've found a sure way to earn some quickly. All we need to do is find a good place to destroy Trances. So sad you came by and destroyed my glider.

ORG_BLACKGAMERS.NAME: The Black Players
ORG_BLACKGAMERS.TEXT: <image:ORG_BLACKGAMERS.tga><image:MOD_GL_S2_A_BLACKGAMER>The Black Players are a very old symbiot clan, probably the oldest one. But they are far from being the strongest. They goal is very simple and in this respect they have a lot in common with the mechminds. The Black Players strive for perfection in combat. They attack only those mechminds and symbiots who match them in power or are stronger than they are. With them there is no telling who will win. This is the essence of the Black Player's way to perfection.

ORG_CARRIERS.NAME: The Carriers
ORG_CARRIERS.TEXT:
The Carriers are one of the most peaceful clans. They transport cargo, just as the Trances do, but they have certain differences. The Trances carry only those loads they can profit from, while the Carriers would sometimes work even when losing profits.

They usually travel in groups of six gliders, each group consisting of two transports and four attack ships, providing security. As their practice shows in all the Range sectors, this tactic is very efficient. The main goal of the Carriers is cargo delivery, and they would never attack first, unless they encounter an enemy. Attacking them, however, may be very dangerous. The attacker would become the clan's personal enemy, and the Carriers remember their enemies for a long time.

Besides, if you bother the Carriers too much by attacking their caravans you might as well become an enemy for the Sinigers - the two have formed a sort of an alliance. This in turn may result in losing several rating points.

ORG_ELIMINATORS.NAME: The Destroyers
ORG_ELIMINATORS.TEXT:
The Destroyers clan is very old, one of the first clans to emerge in this sector. As far as I remember, they immediately started to dominate -- until the Wild arrived. They still fight with each other. Such war has certain benefits: they achieve some sort of balance so the others can develop comparatively easily.

Usually the Destroyers attack any glider in their sight. Their objective is to achieve perfection in attacking. Warriors of this clan have weak defenses and very powerful weapons.

The Destroyers use only high-speed type-3 gliders and move in groups of two or three. They are rather strong warriors, but if one is a Destroyer, the rest of them usually retreat.

ORG_FINDERS.NAME: The Seekers
ORG_FINDERS.TEXT:
The Seeker clan is unique. These are symbiots-specials. They have a test complex of their own which serves them as a base. Nobody really knows what their goal is. If you feel like it, drop by their base and ask them. I can provide you only with some general information.

The Seekers accept only missiles and heavy weapons. Their gliders do not even have the pylons for light weapons, but they are very fast, and equipped with the optical masking system.

The Seekers may attack both single-handedly and in groups. What also happens is you would encounter one Seeker, destroy it, and then one or two more would appear from out of the blue. And this would repeat until you are completely destroyed. In short, their tactics are diverse while their goals are unknown.

ORG_FIRST.NAME: The First Ones
ORG_FIRST.TEXT:
The First Ones are the oldest of the existing clans. Consists of a large group of mechminds which Super selected for his experiment on developing the intellect. The experiment was successful.

All the later modifications of mechminds, and soon after, the symbiots, have found the Osmose, but the First Ones are different from everyone else. They may receive Super's shape-thoughts in any sector of the Range. Of course, the difference in the level of intellect between the Super and mechminds is too great for them to understand him to the full extent. To the best of my knowledge, they do have some communication problems, but in general they understand each other pretty well. This is enough for Super to use the First to act among the mechminds and symbiots. And they act very efficiently, for that matter. They are the best fighters. The only match for them are the symbiots of the Siniger clan.

The First usually go in groups of five gliders, keeping a certain distance from each other. If you are lucky enough to destroy a whole group of First Ones they will find you, no matter what.

ORG_FREE.NAME: The Free Ones
ORG_FREE.TEXT: The mechminds that do not belong to any organization.

ORG_FREE_MEMBER.NAME: A  Free One
ORG_FREE_MEMBER.TEXT: A mechmind that does not belong to any organization.

ORG_HUNTERS.NAME: Hunters
ORG_HUNTERS.TEXT: <image:ORG_HUNTERS.tga><image:MOD_GL_S1_A_HUNTER>If you see a lone symbiot glider away from the road, chances are this is a Hunter. They use attack-type gliders and will always come at you if you're alone. The Hunters do not go after groups, preferring duel fights. They have been operating in this  territory for a while now and seem to be quite content with the current state of affairs.

ORG_INVADERS.NAME: Invaders
ORG_INVADERS.TEXT: <image:ORG_INVADERS.tga><image:MOD_GL_M1_S_INVADER>The Invaders will attack anyone who lives in this sector or who comes here by accident. They always try to take away your cargo, and if this does not work, they will attack. You will easily recognize them when you see them high-speed gliders moving in 2-, 3-,  or 4-strong groups. Try to avoid them you are not experienced enough, and they are strong fighters. The invaders try to stay close to Charge platforms, but basically you could encounter them anywhere in this sector.

ORG_NARGOON.NAME: The Nargoons
ORG_NARGOON.TEXT:
The Nargoon ideas have become outdated and they are now searching for a new way. Their initial task was quite primitive - protect the specifications and provide resources to test complexes. But then the symbiots appeared and the situation changed drastically, there were now more specifications around.

The test complexes, too, are regularly receiving all the necessary resources and the specification clans are very strong and have no need for additional protection. I think the Nargoons will either change their goal soon or disband altogether. But so far they are still alive and kicking.

Their gliders look quite awkward which, however, does not prevent them from carrying two pairs of light weapons while maintaining impressive maneuverability and speed.

These days Nargoons are everywhere doing all the possible things, but mainly fighting their old enemies.

ORG_PANZERS.NAME: The Panzers
ORG_PANZERS.TEXT: The Panzers are basically an  upgraded version of the Trances. Their main goal is trading. Trances will never transport cargo if they cannot profit. Same with the Panzers. They have a lot of power, which allows them to equip their gliders very well and to recover fast after being destroyed. Powerful engines, strong armor and a spacious glider are the key characteristics of the Panzers. By the way, the bases treat them very well and will often repair their ships for free. Communications are a very useful thing for us and very profitable for the mechminds if the deal is serious.

ORG_PANZIR.NAME: The Panzers
ORG_PANZIR.TEXT:
As a matter of fact, the Panzers simply are more developed Trances. Their main activity is the same - trading. The Trances never carry a cargo when the delivery is not profitable. The Panzers act accordingly. They have lots of energy, allowing them to equip their gliders and recover quickly.

Powerful engines, robust armor, and spacious gliders are characteristic of the Panzers. By the way, bases treat them rather friendly and usually offer free repairs. Communications are a useful thing for us and profitable for mechminds, providing they are treated seriously.

ORG_RECKONERS.NAME: The Reckoners
ORG_RECKONERS.TEXT:
The Reckoners are fourth-generation symbiots. The third generation was too numerous and formed various movements, after which Super became more careful. As a result of this, came the Reckoners. In fact, this is a clan, although it spans the whole generation. It's a clan with its own ideology and views on the world around them. Very unusual views for that matter.

The Reckoners do not use weapons. In fact, they do not fight at all, although no one knows why. Their main goal, to the best of my knowledge, is seeking and collecting information, all kinds of data about the world and the goings-on in it. Many organizations use that information. Not for free of course - everyone needs energy.

If the Reckoners are attacked they will then refuse to provide information to the mechmind or symbiot who attacked them. And - if the attacker was in a clan - they would decline the whole clan. So, it is pretty obvious why no one ever touches them.

ORG_RECONERS.NAME: The Reckoners
ORG_RECONERS.TEXT:
The Reckoners are fourth-generation symbiots. The third generation was too numerous and formed various movements, after which Super became more careful. As a result of this, the Reckoners came into existence. In fact, this is a clan, although it spans the whole generation. A clan that has its own ideology and views on the world around them -- very unusual views for that matter.

The Reckoners do not use weapons. In fact, they do not fight at all, although no one knows why. Their main goal, to the best of my knowledge, is seeking and collecting information -- all kinds of data about the world and the goings-on in it. Many organizations use that information. Not for free, of course - everyone needs energy.

If the Reckoners are attacked, they will then refuse to provide information to the mechmind or symbiot who attacked them. And - if the attacker was in a clan - they will refuse the whole clan. So, it is pretty obvious why no one ever touches them.

ORG_RESTRICTORS.NAME: The Restrictors
ORG_RESTRICTORS.TEXT:
The Restrictors as a clan formed not long ago. A testing range ran out of resources. A large group of the Free Ones went there with a cargo. Soon a sign of a new clan appeared over the complex. Nobody saw the Free Ones with their gliders again. Those who emerged from the depths of the testing complex called themselves the Restrictors. Their gliders of brand new model have fast maneuverability, and their firepower is very impressive.

The goal of the Restrictors is very interesting, too. They excel in attacking with one type of weapon. Usually they attack in groups of three. The Restrictors attack very seldom.

They constantly try to increase the number of their followers. As soon as someone has reached a particular rating and is free, they invite him to join the clan. If some Free One declines the offer, they start hunting him to pull him a couple of rating points down.

ORG_SC.NAME: The Structure  of Changes
ORG_SC.TEXT:
The Structure of Changes is an organization of mechminds, although many symbiots share their same views. The goal of the Structure of Changes is excellence in everything, and the path is variable. The principle is simple - if the development is not possible in one direction - it is time to change it. Thus all the characteristics are developed evenly.

A mechmind, as a member of the Structure of Changes, receives power every time his rating is changed. The power is taken from the storage that is collected by all the members of the organization. With every visit to the base, a small amount of power is extracted. The amount is not essential for a mechmind, but the support after an increase of rating is quite large.

The clansmen use different gliders. That's why you should pay attention to the sign of the organization.

ORG_SC_MEMBER.NAME: Member of the Structure of Changes

ORG_SINIGR.NAME: The Sinigers
ORG_SINIGR.TEXT:
Nobody knows where the name of this clan originates from. Maybe it has a meaning in the Arling language, as Nargoon does. Maybe not. The Siniger clan is a small part of the third generation of symbiots. Super is positive that they have not turned out as perfect as he planned them to be. However, the mechminds and symbiots do not agree. The Sinigers are the strongest symbiot clan. No one wants to mess with them these days, the reason for which lies in the past. Once there used to be a large Forward clan, which got messed up with the Sinigers for some reason. The war went on for a while. Those of the Forward who took the chance to leave the clan kept their rating. The rest were downed to zero and Reset.

Resetting is not the best thing that can happen to your race and is something to be avoided at any cost. And the Sinigers always reduce their enemies to Reset. Nowadays, they are hardly at war with anyone, except for the First.

ORG_TRANSES.NAME: Trances
ORG_TRANSES.TEXT: <image:ORG_TRANCES.tga><image:MOD_GL_M1_C_TRANS>There are considerably many Trances in this and adjacent sectors. Trances are mechminds specializing in cargo transportation. At times they would come in small groups to oppose the Invaders. Trances will never attack first unless you are their enemy. Battle is not their thing, and they prefer accumulating power and gaining ratings through trade and delivery of valuable cargoes.

ORG_TROOPS.NAME: The Packs
ORG_TROOPS.TEXT:
The packs are groups of Free Ones without any ideas whatsoever. The mechminds or symbiots comprising them may have completely different ratings. The gliders also may vary, including special-purpose ones. Packs are usually a place for enemies of the clans, or those who like to act in a group and not think about the consequences.
